thread.section_title: AnaJet Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of AnaJet | anajet.com
thread.title: Kelly Ervin

author: Kelly Ervin
title: Kelly Ervin
text:
We bought our machine about a year ago and although there is a bit of a learning process to get everything going we have overall been very successful. Technical support has always been on top of helping us with any issues and our sales rep, Shawn Stender, has gone above and beyond in helping us acquire the printer as well as several follow up calls to check on us and even supports our FaceBook page. Thank you everyone at Anajet for making our business great!
Kelly Ervin, Owner
Fast Dog Print Co.
